actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

actions.subcommittee: Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology

official_title: To amend title 31, United States Code, to provide reasonable standards for congressional gold medals, and for other purposes.
short_title: Congressional Gold Medal Enhancement Act of 2004

summary.text: Congressional Gold Medal Enhancement Act of 2004 - Amends Federal monetary law to set forth Congressional Gold Medal Standards under which the Secretary of the Treasury is authorized to strike not more than two congressional gold medals for presentation during any calendar year.

titles.title: Congressional Gold Medal Enhancement Act of 2004
To amend title 31, United States Code, to provide reasonable standards for congressional gold medals, and for other purposes.
